lead_paragraph: Stefan Schumacher of Germany won the Eneco Benelux Tour yesterday by one second. He beat George Hincapie of the United States, who was riding for the Discovery Channel team, after Hincapie fell in the final sprint. Schumacher was hit on the arm by a fan and veered, inadvertently causing Hincapie’s crash. Schumacher finished third in the stage, giving him enough points to win the weeklong event.
